title: Texas Wesleyan Cancels Play After Students Object to Slur
description: The play’s author, who is Black, said he crafted its language to be historically accurate in representing civil rights struggles. But the theater program at the university heeded the call of students.
dc:creator: April Rubin
media:description: Texas Wesleyan University in Fort Worth halted the production of the play “Down In Mississippi” after students raised concerns over its use of racial slurs to refer to Black people.
